player

Class PlayerStatistics

  • java.lang.Object
    • player.PlayerStatistics

  • public class PlayerStatistics
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is able to calculate statistics to show how well the Gambler is doing. It records wins and then is able to find the percentage of wins, how many loses, if they double downed, etc.
    Author:
    RossWeinstein

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PlayerStatistics()
      Constructs a basic PlayerStatistics object with all values set to 0

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Get the total number of blackjack hands won
      java.lang.String getPercentageWon()
      Get the percentage of blackjack hands won
      int getTotalDoubleDowns()
      Get the total number of Double Down hands played.
      void lostHand(int betAmount)
      If the player lost their hand, update hand total, hands lost, and subtract bet amount to Gambler's bank roll.
      void playedDoubleDownHand()
      Denote that the player has placed a Double Down bet
      void pushedHand()
      If player pushed with the dealer, increment hands pushed
      void resetStats()
      Returns all statistics back to 0.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns all relevant information from PlayerStatistics Class
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        String the Players Money Won/Loss; Win Percentage; Hands Player; Hands Won; Hands Lost; Hands Pushed; Number Of Double Down Hands

      • wonHand

        public void wonHand(int betAmount)
        If the player won their hand, update hand total, hands won, and add bet amount to Gambler's bank roll.
        Parameters:
        betAmount - how much is the Player's bet

      • lostHand

        public void lostHand(int betAmount)
        If the player lost their hand, update hand total, hands lost, and subtract bet amount to Gambler's bank roll.
        Parameters:
        betAmount - how much is the Player's bet

      • pushedHand

        public void pushedHand()
        If player pushed with the dealer, increment hands pushed

        Returns all statistics back to 0.

      • getPercentageWon

        public java.lang.String getPercentageWon()
        Get the percentage of blackjack hands won
        Returns:
        String the percentage of hands the Player has won. If they have not played any hands it return 0, rather than Nan

      • getTotalDoubleDowns

        public int getTotalDoubleDowns()
        Get the total number of Double Down hands played.
        Returns:
        int how many times the Player has double downed
